Reviews.Title: Great package
Reviews.Author: Julie Kerr Gines
Reviews.Content: This kit gets you started with what you need. The Canon 7D is a great camera! The two lenses in the package give you the versatility of both macro as well as telephoto.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS 7D 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera w/ Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6...
Reviews.Author: ItsMeAmanda
Reviews.Content: Love the camera, great price. No complaints.The kit has the usual stuff in it that bundles have. The CF card works well and the UV filter is good.**12/5/13 as PK points out in the comments I typed SD and meant CF in my original review. The interweb critics can all rest in piece now.**

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS 7D 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens & Canon EF-S 55-250mm f/4-5.6 IS AF Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
0.45x Wide Angle Lens w/ Carry Pouch and Caps + 2X Telephoto Lens W/Carry Pouch and Caps
16GB Compact Flash Memory Card + Multi 50 in 1 USB Card Reader
Rechargeable LPE6 Lithium Ion Replacement Battery + External Rapid Quick-Charger
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 7D 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera w/ Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens & Canon EF-S 55-250mm f/4.0-5.6 IS Telephoto Zoom Lens LPE6 Battery/Charger Wide Angle / Telephoto Lenses Filter Kit 16GB Tripod DavisMAX IS Bundle
